name: Beam Scheme
description:
A puzzle game with crates pushing and lasers.

Your goal is to destroy all red and green bombs on the level using the laser beam of the respective color. Push reflective crates to redirect your laser beam throughout the stage. When all bombs are destroyed, proceed to the designated exit.

Playing in Chrome highly recommended, Firefox is likely to have performance issues. I will fix this after the rating period is over.

Controls:

WSAD - move

Space + WSAD - pull objects
